left.text: I'd like to have a serious discussion with you. Maybe we could agree on some provisions?

right.text: BAD is good, but only when it's tyrannous being a pseudo hero

left.text: it's not that you're being BAD, it's that you're gaining satisfaction from it. and this is...unacceptable to say the least

right.text: and i saw that awful headphones picture on z2. you ARE fury aren't you
